org.drip.measure.lebesgue

Class R1PiecewiseLinear

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.R1
      • org.drip.measure.lebesgue.R1Uniform
        • org.drip.measure.lebesgue.R1PiecewiseLinear

  • public class R1PiecewiseLinear
extends R1Uniform
    R1PiecewiseLinear implements the Piecewise Linear R^1 Distributions. It exports the Methods corresponding to the R^1 Lebesgue Base Class.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
